alert.note: Alert for Delta; Menominee (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued April 04 at 4:03AM EDT until April 05 at 2:00PM EDT by NWS Marquette
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 8 PM EDT /7 PM CDT/ THIS EVENING TO 2 PM EDT /1 PM CDT/ WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Mixed precipitation expected. Total snow accumulations of up to one inch and ice accumulations of up to one quarter of an inch well inland in the far northern portions of the counties. East to southeast winds gusting as high as 45 mph. * WHERE...Menominee and Delta Counties. * WHEN...From 8 PM EDT /7 PM CDT/ this evening to 2 PM EDT /1 PM CDT/ Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Power outages and tree damage are possible due to the ice. Travel could be nearly impossible to hazardous in spots. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning commute.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling.
